Title: SilverMossChart
Description: SMC makes it easier for end user to see calculate data in sharepoint custom list fields.SMC is use visifire(http://www.visifire.com/) charts .
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SMC makes it easier for end user to see calculate data in sharepoint custom list fields.SMC is use visifire(http://www.visifire.com/) charts .

I developed this webpart to calculate sharepoint list fields easier and user can make a decision certainly. Webpart use sharepoint webservices for get list information. Users can select a list then set a field name ,and they can see pie or column charts.
